uvme_args
uvm_object
uvme_args

The uvme_args class is an enhancement class on top of uvm_args.  User no need to create uvm_event explicitly.  User can directly call uvme_args::trigger("myEvent"); and uvme_args::wait_trigger("myEvent"); There are build-in trace message print to help debug.

Functions
new
function new(
string name = "uvme_args"
)

get_inst
static function uvme_args get_inst()

Get global access object of uvme_args For example:

uvme_args args = uvme_args::get_inst();
